home.activites.le-marche.text:
This market, one of the largest in the department, has become a must.
Open every day from 8am to 1:30pm (2pm on weekends and public holidays) from June 15 to September 15, from oysters to MÃ©doc wine, not forgetting crafts, there's something for everyone.
A must when visiting Montalivet!
home.activites.parc-de-l-aventure.text:
Parc de l'Aventure is a 15-activity theme park in the heart of nature. Acrobranche, zip lines, miniglof, archery, treasure hunts...
https://www.laforet-aventure.com
home.activites.surf.text:
Learn to ride. Share unforgettable moments on the waves. With family or friends, book an introduction to surfing with one of Montalivet's surf schools

https://www.montasurfschool.com https://www.carakas.fr https://www.ecoledesurfmontalivet.com https://www.lablisscompagnie.com/bliss-surf-school/
home.activites.velo.text:
Discover our beautiful region in a different way. La VÃ©lodyssÃ©e is a 1200 km cycling trail along the Atlantic coastline that will delight all cycling enthusiasts. Whether you're with friends or family, take advantage of the great outdoors and embark on an adventure!

https://www.lavelodyssee.com/
home.activites.vignobles.text:
Follow the famous MÃ©doc wine route to discover the art of winegrowing! With tastings, estate visits and guided walks, you'll learn all about the history and know-how of the 8 Appellations d'Origine ControlÃ©e and the winegrowers of the MÃ©doc.

https://www.medocvignoble.com/bienvenue-en-medoc-vignoble/envie-de-decouvrir-la-route-des-vins/
home.bienvenu-section.text:
Located 600m from the beach, Camping Montacabana welcomes you to Montalivet from June 28 to September 30 on its natural, privileged seaside site!

ðŸ©´ Give up your car! ðŸ©´
Ideally located, beach at 600m, town center at 800m, its regionally renowned market bars, restaurants and supermarkets.

Camping Montacabana is the ideal place to spend your vacations, with family or friends, between comfort, idleness, activities and discovering the region's most beautiful sites.
